		Question: who is dustin johnson the golfer
		Answer:
answer: Dustin Johnson is a professional golfer who was born on June 22, 1984 in Columbia, South Carolina. He turned professional in 2007 and has since won 24 PGA Tour events, including two major championships. Johnson is currently ranked number one in the world and is married to Paulina Gretzky. They have two children.
